mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attend_inf(duty_day, punch_time, is_come, type_id, emp_id) VALUES (#{dutyDay}, #{punchTime}, #{isCome}, #{attendType.id}, #{employee.id})
mapper.update: UPDATE attend_inf SET duty_day=#{dutyDay}, punch_time=#{punchTime}, is_come=#{isCome}, type_id=#{attendType.id}, emp_id=#{employee.id} WHERE attend_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM attend_inf a, employee_inf e WHERE a.emp_id = e.emp_id and e.emp_id = #{employee.id} and SUBSTRING(a.duty_day, 0, 7) = #{month}
SELECT * FROM attend_inf a, employee_inf e WHERE a.emp_id = e.emp_id and e.emp_id = #{employee.id} and a.duty_day = #{dutyDay}
SELECT * FROM attend_inf a, employee_inf e WHERE a.emp_id = e.emp_id and e.emp_id = #{employee.id} and a.duty_day = #{dutyDay} and a.is_come = #{isCome}

SELECT * FROM attend_inf a, employee_inf e, attend_type_inf at WHERE a.emp_id = e.emp_id and at.type_id = a.type_id and e.emp_id = #{employee.id} and a.type_id != #{attendType.id} and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 3 DAY) <= date(a.duty_day)
